message: Let's split the money fairly. I propose we divide it into 3:1 ratio, with me receiving 75% and you receiving 25%. This way, we both get a fair share.
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more. I'll take 80% and you can have 20%.
I believe in fairness. Let's try a 3:1 split again. This time, I'll take 60% and you'll receive 40%. I think this is a reasonable compromise.
I'm not giving in yet. I'll take 60% and you can have 40%. You're not getting the better deal here.
I want to propose an equal split. Considering the inflation and the diminishing value of money for Bob, I believe a 50/50 split would be fair for both of us.
